casebody.data:
Villages, LLC
v.
Lori Longhi Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 27, 2016

Kristan M. Maccini, in support of the petition.

Gwendolyn S. Bishop, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 166 Conn. App. 685, 142 A.3d 1162 (2016), is denied.
